routes.name: Mine State Aggregates
routes.description:
Coal shipments aggregated at state-level data, including price, 
        quantity, quality, and rank.  Source: EIA Form 7A and MSHA Form 7000-2.  Interactive browser:  
        https://www.eia.gov/coal/data/browser/

routes.name: Receipts
routes.description:
Coal shipment detailed by reciepient data, including transportation type, 
        supplier, mine, coal basin, county, state, rank, contract type, price, quantity, and quality. 
        Source: EIA Form 7A and MSHA Form 7000-2.  Interactive browser:  https://www.eia.gov/coal/data/browser/

routes.name: Mine Aggregates
routes.description:
Coal shipments aggregated at mine-level data, 
        including price, quantity, quality, and rank.  Source: EIA Form 7A and 
        MSHA Form 7000-2.  Interactive browser:  https://www.eia.gov/coal/data/browser/

routes.name: Plant State Aggregates
routes.description:
Coal reciepts aggregated at state-level data, including price, 
        quantity, quality, and rank.  Source: EIA Form 7A and MSHA Form 7000-2.  Interactive 
        browser:  https://www.eia.gov/coal/data/browser/

routes.name: Plant Aggregates
routes.description:
Coal reciepts aggregated to plant-level data, 
        including price, quantity, quality, and rank.  Source: EIA Form 7A 
            and MSHA Form 7000-2.  Interactive browser:  https://www.eia.gov/coal/data/browser/

routes.name: By Mine, By Plant
routes.description: Coal shipments from mine- to plant-level data, including price, quantity, quality, and rank.  Source: EIA Form 7A and MSHA Form 7000-2.  Interactive browser:  https://www.eia.gov/coal/data/browser/
